attacks.name: Brawl
attacks.special: Each Critical Hit allows one more D6 to be rolled.

attacks.name: Roundhouse Punch
attacks.special: If the Target is Prone, if there are more Successes than Failures, the Character is moved 3" in a direction chosen by the Ourk player.

attacks.name: Bludgeon
attacks.special: Critical Hits cause the next Attack to have +1 Power. This does not stack.
